name: seerrbridge
tagline: A bridge for extending Seerr media integrations
description: SeerrBridge is a companion tool that links Seerr with additional media backends, allowing enhanced cross-service interactions and automation for home media setups.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Connects Seerr with additional media management backends

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Keeps request status in sync across connected services

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Forwards notifications between Seerr and backend services

features.title: REST API
features.description: Translates API calls between different service versions and formats

features.title: Load Balancing
features.description: Distributes requests across multiple backend instances for scalability
